committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend subchapter II of chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, with respect to the rates of pay for levels III, IV and V of the Executive Schedule.

summary.text: Increases the rates of pay for levels III, IV, and V of the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to amend subchapter II of chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, with respect to the rates of pay for levels III, IV and V of the Executive Schedule.
